text: Black Snake Moan is a 2006 American black comedy drama movie written and directed by Craig Brewer and stars Christina Ricci, Samuel L. Jackson, and Justin Timberlake. It was distributed by Paramount Vantage and was a box office bomb. == Other websites == * * * Category:2006 comedy-drama movies Category:2000s black comedy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Craig Brewer
title: Black Snake Moan
